item.title: Ray Tracing in One Weekend on WebAssembly
item.description: samples: A partial Ray Tracing in One Weekend running on the browser with WebAssembly, built by Zig. Fat pointer interfaces in Zig It is possible to implement the Go style interface values in Zig with the help of c_void pointers. Implementing interface pattern is wordier than in other languages (Go, Python, Rust, …), but it is refreshing to see the mechanism that is hidden in other languages laid bare when writing in Zig.
